path.style: fill: none; stroke: rgb(188, 44, 44); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2;
fill: none; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2;
fill: none; stroke: rgb(188, 44, 44); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2;
